org.spf4j.io
Class Csv

java.lang.Object
  org.spf4j.io.Csv

public final class Csv
extends Object

Supports CSV format as described at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values. either of \n \r or \r\n are valid end of line delimiters why another implementation? because I need one that is as fast as possible, and as flexible as possible.

Author:
zoly
